personal.name: Zain Ahmad
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & UI/UX Designer
personal.tagline: Crafting digital experiences that make a difference

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

summary: Passionate full-stack developer with 3+ years of experience creating user-centered digital solutions. Specialized in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. I thrive on turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs. Always eager to learn new technologies and collaborate on impactful projects.

experience.description: Lead frontend development for enterprise-level applications serving 100K+ users. Architected and implemented responsive web applications using React and TypeScript.
achievements: Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization and lazy loading
Led a team of 4 developers in delivering 3 major product releases
Implemented comprehensive testing suite, reducing bugs by 60%

experience.description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications for early-stage startup. Worked closely with founders to define product requirements and user experience.
achievements: Built MVP from scratch, helping secure $2M in Series A funding
Implemented real-time features using WebSockets and Socket.io
Optimized database queries, reducing response time by 50%

projects.title: EcoTracker
projects.subtitle: Sustainability Tracking App
projects.description: A comprehensive web application that helps users track their carbon footprint and adopt sustainable practices. Features real-time data visualization and personalized recommendations.

projects.title: TaskMaster Pro
projects.subtitle: Advanced Project Management Tool
projects.description: A modern project management application with advanced features like time tracking, team collaboration, and automated reporting. Built for small to medium-sized teams.

projects.title: HealthHub Dashboard
projects.subtitle: Healthcare Analytics Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard for healthcare professionals to visualize patient data, track treatment progress, and generate insights. Features advanced data visualization and reporting capabilities.

contact.availability: Available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities
